content:
unravel and Drop a dance production featuring both student and professional choreography is set to premiere Friday PERIOD

The production is expected to bring a wide range of student and professional talent to the stage in a diverse and memorable evening of dance according to a press release from the Theatre and Dance Department PERIOD

Katie Trigg Heidi Prendergast and Mimi Ferrie all senior dance majors will be performing in the production PERIOD

All three of the students choreographed pieces which will be featured in the concert PERIOD Additionally two works choreographed by professionals will be featured PERIOD

I took classes from Jennifer Nugent this summer in New York and asked her if she would create a piece for me to do Trigg said PERIOD She agreed and the piece turned out really cool. ferrie learned her piece from San Franciscobased choreographer Kathleen Hermesdorf whom she met this summer at a dance festival PERIOD

It is kind of funny because by default we all ended up with similar styles said Trigg PERIOD

The concert will focus on a variety of issues ranging from individuality and personal reflection to relationships and generational gaps PERIOD

I want people to be engaged and have some sort of opinion about what they see Trigg said PERIOD I dont want nondancers to just come and view the show PERIOD I want them to get something out of it PERIOD I tried to make my piece about art rather than entertainment. trigg also said that two of the pieces will be performed on a set which is unusual for a dance concert PERIOD

The three students involved in the production are all bachelor of fine arts degree candidates PERIOD Unravel and Drop will be performed in the Irey Theatre and will run from Dec PERIOD  to Dec PERIOD  PERIOD
